moves.name: Sludge
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk All
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Atk of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Let’s Keep Cool!
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Def and Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.effect: This move’s power is doubled when the target is poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Tighten Up 2
passives.description: Has a chance (30%) of raising the user’s Sp. Def by one stat rank when it is hit by an attack move.
